snippet.title: CRABADA ROAD TO BATTLE GAME 15 [Launching 15 May 2022]
snippet.description:
Battle 15 of 15 leading up to the Battle Game launch! Crabada's Battle Game will be launching on 15 May!

🦀🌊 Stay Updated 🌊🦀
Website: https://www.crabada.com/  |   Discord: https://discord.gg/PlayCrabada  |  Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayCrabada  |  Whitepaper: https://docs.crabada.com/  |  Medium: https://medium.com/@PlayCrabada  |  Telegram: https://t.me/playcrabada

🦀🌊 About Crabada 🌊🦀
Treasures (Under Sea) of undiscovered past await the daring adventurers who seek the future. Mine, Loot, Breed, Battle! Explore rich new lands across the Ocean as you march sideways into an immersive idle gaming experience! Are you ready, Adventurer? 

Crabada is an exciting play-and-earn idle game based in a world filled with fierce fighting Hermit-Crabs called Crabada (the NFTs). Players will rediscover the prosperous ancient kingdom of Crabada and earn valuable rewards through exploration, adventure and intense claw-to-claw combat!

Will you be the one to take the place as King of the Crabada? Or will you sow the seeds of discord across the land? The world is your oyster. Soon, they will tremble when they hear your name.

💎Unique PvP-infused Idle Gameplay 
💎Breeding and Marketplace 
💎Lending and Hiring Tavern 
💎Robust 2022 Roadmap and Game Progression 
💎Game Incentives and Rewards

In Crabada, players can play to earn CRA, the governance token, and TUS (Treasure Under Sea), Crabada’s in-game currency.

🦀⚔️Cross-platform Battle Game (May 2022)  

Crabada will be available on mobile platforms in May 2022 with the release of a new and immersive Battle Game mode. Players can watch exciting battles unfold as their Crabada cast unique skills in claw-to-claw combat.

With the inclusion new PVE areas and campaigns, PVP Tournaments, Land Ownership, Equipments and even Co-Op World Boss Raids, Crabada has a robust road map and game progression planned ahead.
